name: gatsby-starter-default
description: Vo.Ci. San Marino, Associazione VOlontari CIvici San Marino
author: Simone Foschi <s.foschi@gmail.com>
license: Private Repo, all rights reserved © Simone Foschi

scripts.img-move: npm run mkdir -p public/img && npm run cp -r content/assets/images/blog/* public/img/
scripts.css-move: npm run mkdir -p public/css && npm run cp -r src/styles/global.css public/css/ && npm run cp -r src/styles/global.css.map public/css/
scripts.build-prod: npm run build && npm run serve && npm run build-css-img
scripts.build-dev: npm run build && npm run start && npm run build-css-img
scripts.clean-node: npm run rm -rf ./node_modules && npm run rm package-lock.json
scripts.clean-all: npm run clean && npm run clean-node && npm run clean-public && npm run clean-cache
scripts.clean-build-run-all: npm run clean-all && npm install && npm run build-run
